This skill allow people to function as independent, productive and responsible members of the public.  They need to be able to think for themselves, and not just accept what they are told.  A functioning democracy requires it population to understand what is going on in the world and make the proper decisions, and hold their leaders to account.  Critical thinking means people won't be taken advantage of, will see things as they truly are, and will be able to make informed decisions.   This is the most important thing students should learn in school

This skill allow people to function as independent, productive and responsible members of the public.  They need to be able to think for themselves, and not just accept what they are told.  A functioning democracy requires it population to understand what is going on in the world and make the proper decisions, and hold their leaders to account.  Critical thinking means people won't be taken advantage of, will see things as they truly are, and will be able to make informed decisions. Also, they need to learn the skills to pursue the career that they want.  After this, however, they need to be able to think critically.   This skill allow people to function as independent, productive and responsible members of the public.  They need to be able to think for themselves, and not just accept what they are told.  A functioning democracy requires it population to understand what is going on in the world and make the proper decisions, and hold their leaders to account.  Critical thinking means people won't be taken advantage of, will see things as they truly are, and will be able to make informed decisions. A functioning democracy requires it population to understand what is going on in the world and make the proper decisions, and hold their leaders to account.  Critical thinking means people won't be taken advantage of, will see things as they truly are, and will be able to make informed decisions.   This is the most important thing students should learn in school, and every lesson taught, whether math, science, social studies, should have an element of this life skill.
